name: Floating Wishlist for WooCommerce
author: Taras Sych

sections.description:
Yes, it’s just a Wishlist, nothing else!

Plugin helps to increase online sales by allowing users to bookmark products in the Wishlist, and keep your WordPress install clean of heavy plugins with unnecessary functions.

Wishlist works as a stack and can contain up to 5 products – this allows to keep Wishlist panel small, usable and fit into almost any design.

Store products in the customers Wishlist up to 30 days using web browser Cookies.

Does not collect and store any customer personal information.

Tested with most popular WooCommerce themes.
No shortcodes or any code inserts needed.
Works well just “from the box”!
sections.installation:
1. Upload woo-floating-wishlist folder into the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or use automatic WP Plugin Installer.
  2. Activate through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. All done, your customers can start using it!
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • WP 6.2 Compatibility issues resolved

1.0.1

  • Minor updates to match WP.org requirements

1.0.0

  • First stable version released for public usage

0.5

  • The idea was born

short_description: Easy to use, always on display, floating Wishlist for your WooCommerce store.
